item.title: About Me
item.description: I’m Panagiotis Englezos, a full-stack & android developer based in Greece ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡·. Experienced with the Android Open Source Project (AOSP) I’m building Android custom ROMs, I actively contribute to open-source software and most of my projects are open-source, available on my Github profile. I enjoy working on everything software-related including: backend, frontend, web, mobile apps, and more. Experienced with: git, shell scripting, numerous web frameworks, Linux server management, code review, and collaboration.
